value.name: Solidarity march for Palestine held in Whitehorse
value.description: Whitehorse residents gathered on May 21 to support Palestine in the most recent conflict in Gaza. Around 40 people attended the rally, which started with a moment of silence at the waterfront totem pole before supporters marched to the Elijah Smith building for speeches and chanting.

value.name: Person Of Interest In Bronx Shooting Death Case ID'd
value.description: Police say around 8 Monday night, 25-year-old Elijah Smith fled the scene of a fatal shooting in the Williamsbridge section of the Bronx.

value.name: West Salem High School Class of '21
value.description: West Salem High School commencement will be held at 1:30 p.m. May 30 in the high school gymnasium. The ceremony is only open to the graduates and up to four family members with tickets.
